basics.name: Rayaan Ahmed Memon
basics.label: DIY Hobbyist and Event Organizer
basics.summary: Passionate and driven DIY hobbyist, event organizer, and technical enthusiast with a strong ability to innovate and execute projects successfully. With hands-on expertise in electronics, automotive customization, and large-scale event management, I thrive in problem-solving, creative execution, and networking. My experience in organizing major events, including Olympiad 2025 and MUNIC 2024, showcases my ability to handle high-pressure situations and deliver results.

work.summary: Worked independently on electronics, automotive modifications, and event organization.
highlights: Designed and built custom amplifiers, PCBs, and automation systems.
Developed and installed automotive electronic systems and custom setups.
Managed event logistics, vendor coordination, and event execution.

volunteer.summary: Ensured safety and managed crowd during the event.
highlights: Maintained order and crowd control during all sessions.

volunteer.summary: Led the last-minute setup of Anural Khalidâ€™s concert, ensuring smooth execution.
highlights: Coordinated technical and stage setup under time pressure.

awards.title: Honorary Mention
awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding contribution to event execution.

awards.summary: Acknowledged for active involvement in event security and organization.
